concept.title: Set the Lineweight Scale for a Layout
concept.shortdesc: Even if plot scale of layouts is assigned, it's enabled to scale the lineweight at a certain scale. Scaling the lineweight is nothing to do with the plot scale when plotting drawings, which is mainly used for the lines included in the objects to be plotted.

conbody.p: In most cases, you choose to plot layouts with default plotting scale of 1:1. However, to plot the layout scaled by paper size A on another paper size E, you should scale lineweights to fit the new plot scale.
